00031 #define MAX_BACKEND_SESSION 128
00032 
00033 /* These are the authentication request codes sent by the backend. */
00034 
00035 #define AUTH_REQ_OK         0   /* User is authenticated  */
00036 #define AUTH_REQ_KRB4       1   /* Kerberos V4. Not supported any more. */
00037 #define AUTH_REQ_KRB5       2   /* Kerberos V5 */
00038 #define AUTH_REQ_PASSWORD   3   /* Password */
00039 #define AUTH_REQ_CRYPT      4   /* crypt password. Not supported any more. */
00040 #define AUTH_REQ_MD5        5   /* md5 password */
00041 #define AUTH_REQ_SCM_CREDS  6   /* transfer SCM credentials */
00042 #define AUTH_REQ_GSS        7   /* GSSAPI without wrap() */
00043 #define AUTH_REQ_GSS_CONT   8   /* Continue GSS exchanges */
00044 #define AUTH_REQ_SSPI       9   /* SSPI negotiate without wrap() */
